introductions.situation: Meeting someone for the first time

dialogue.speaker: Person A
dialogue.english: Hello, my name is Marie.

dialogue.speaker: Person B
dialogue.french: Bonjour Marie, je m'appelle Pierre. Enchanté.
dialogue.english: Hello Marie, my name is Pierre. Nice to meet you.

dialogue.speaker: Person A
dialogue.english: Nice to meet you, Pierre. How are you?

dialogue.speaker: Person B
dialogue.english: Very well, thank you. And you?

dialogue.speaker: Person A
dialogue.english: Me too, thank you.

dialogue.speaker: Person A
dialogue.english: Excuse me, what's your name?

dialogue.speaker: Person B
dialogue.english: My name is Sophie. And you?

dialogue.speaker: Person A
dialogue.french: Je m'appelle Jean. Ravi de vous rencontrer.
dialogue.english: My name is Jean. Pleased to meet you.

dialogue.speaker: Person B
dialogue.english: Pleased to meet you too.

dialogue.speaker: Person A
dialogue.english: Good morning! How are you this morning?

dialogue.speaker: Person B
dialogue.french: Bonjour ! Très bien, merci. Et vous ?
dialogue.english: Good morning! Very well, thank you. And you?

dialogue.speaker: Person A
dialogue.french: Ça va bien, merci. Belle journée !
dialogue.english: I'm fine, thank you. Have a nice day!

dialogue.speaker: Person B
dialogue.english: Thank you, you too!

dialogue.speaker: Person A
dialogue.french: Bonsoir ! Comment s'est passée votre journée ?
dialogue.english: Good evening! How was your day?

dialogue.speaker: Person B
dialogue.french: Bonsoir ! Très bien, merci. Et la vôtre ?
dialogue.english: Good evening! Very well, thank you. And yours?

dialogue.speaker: Person A
dialogue.english: Not bad, thank you. Have a good evening!

dialogue.speaker: Person B
dialogue.french: Merci, bonne soirée à vous aussi !
dialogue.english: Thank you, have a good evening too!

dialogue.speaker: Person A
dialogue.french: Excusez-moi, où est la gare, s'il vous plaît ?
dialogue.english: Excuse me, where is the train station, please?

dialogue.speaker: Person B
dialogue.french: La gare est tout droit, à 200 mètres.
dialogue.english: The train station is straight ahead, 200 meters away.

dialogue.speaker: Person A
dialogue.english: Thank you very much!

dialogue.speaker: Person B
dialogue.english: You're welcome, have a good day!

dialogue.speaker: Person A
dialogue.english: Excuse me, do you speak English?

dialogue.speaker: Person B
dialogue.french: Oui, un peu. Comment puis-je vous aider ?
dialogue.english: Yes, a little. How can I help you?

dialogue.speaker: Person A
dialogue.french: Je ne comprends pas. Pouvez-vous répéter ?
dialogue.english: I don't understand. Can you repeat?

dialogue.speaker: Person B
dialogue.english: Of course, more slowly.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.french: Bonjour, je voudrais acheter ce livre.
dialogue.english: Hello, I would like to buy this book.

dialogue.speaker: Shopkeeper
dialogue.english: Very well, that's 15 euros.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.english: Here's 20 euros.

dialogue.speaker: Shopkeeper
dialogue.english: Thank you, here's your change: 5 euros.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.english: Thank you, have a good day!

dialogue.speaker: Shopkeeper
dialogue.english: Thank you, see you soon!

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.english: How much does this apple cost?

dialogue.speaker: Shopkeeper
dialogue.english: It's 2 euros per kilo.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.english: Perfect, I'll take one kilo.

dialogue.speaker: Shopkeeper
dialogue.english: Very well, that's 2 euros.

dialogue.speaker: Waiter
dialogue.english: Hello, have you decided?

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.french: Oui, je voudrais le menu du jour.
dialogue.english: Yes, I would like the daily menu.

dialogue.speaker: Waiter
dialogue.english: Very well, and what to drink?

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.french: Un verre d'eau, s'il vous plaît.
dialogue.english: A glass of water, please.

dialogue.speaker: Waiter
dialogue.french: Parfait, je reviens dans un instant.
dialogue.english: Perfect, I'll be back in a moment.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.english: The bill, please.

dialogue.speaker: Waiter
dialogue.english: Here's the bill: 25 euros.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.english: Here's 30 euros.

dialogue.speaker: Waiter
dialogue.english: Thank you, here's your change.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.english: Thank you, it was delicious!

dialogue.speaker: Person A
dialogue.english: What's the weather like today?

dialogue.speaker: Person B
dialogue.english: It's beautiful and hot.

dialogue.speaker: Person A
dialogue.english: Perfect for a walk!

dialogue.speaker: Person B
dialogue.english: Exactly, it's a beautiful day.

dialogue.speaker: Person A
dialogue.english: It's raining again!

dialogue.speaker: Person B
dialogue.french: Oui, c'est triste. J'espère que ça va s'arrêter.
dialogue.english: Yes, it's sad. I hope it will stop.

dialogue.speaker: Person A
dialogue.french: Moi aussi, j'ai envie de sortir.
dialogue.english: Me too, I want to go out.

dialogue.speaker: Person B
dialogue.english: Tomorrow might be better.

dialogue.speaker: Person A
dialogue.english: Do you have children?

dialogue.speaker: Person B
dialogue.french: Oui, j'ai deux enfants : un fils et une fille.
dialogue.english: Yes, I have two children: a son and a daughter.

dialogue.speaker: Person A
dialogue.english: How old are they?

dialogue.speaker: Person B
dialogue.french: Mon fils a 8 ans et ma fille a 5 ans.
dialogue.english: My son is 8 years old and my daughter is 5 years old.

dialogue.speaker: Person A
dialogue.english: They are adorable!

dialogue.speaker: Person A
dialogue.english: What do you do for work?

dialogue.speaker: Person B
dialogue.english: I am a teacher. And you?

dialogue.speaker: Person A
dialogue.english: I work in an office.

dialogue.speaker: Person B
dialogue.english: That's interesting!
